sentences.en: Again he resorted to the Bowery lodging - house, brooding over where to look.
sentences.cn: 他又回到波威里街的寄宿处, 盘算着去哪里申请救济.

sentences.en: Do you have lodging for tonight?
sentences.cn: 你今晚有借宿的地方 吗 ?

sentences.en: He could not stay in his silent lodging when they were gone.
sentences.cn: 他们走了以后,他在那个寂静的寓所里就待不下去了.

sentences.en: He had much ado in finding out his lodging.
sentences.cn: 他费尽力气才找到住处.

sentences.en: He was given free lodging in a three-room flat.
sentences.cn: 他得以在一间三室公寓里免费住宿。

sentences.en: He wondered how all these other lodging - house people around him got along.
sentences.cn: 他想知道他周围这些住在寄宿处的其他人都是怎么过活的.

sentences.en: How kind of Bill to get our board and lodging ready.
sentences.cn: 约翰真好,给我们安排好了食宿.

sentences.en: It’s £90 a week for board and lodging (= meals and a room ).
The bill is inclusive of the food and lodging.
The chief witness was allowed to leave the town only after lodging a sworn statement with the police.
sentences.cn: 主要见证人向警方提交宣过誓的证词后,才可离开市镇.

sentences.en: The schoolteacher found lodging in the house of his pupils'parents.
sentences.cn: 那教师在他学生父母家中找到搭伙及寄宿的地方.

sentences.en: There were a row of lodging - homes, behind them a railway station.
sentences.cn: 有一排出租的房子, 房子的后面就是火车站.

sentences.en: They have tracked the man Feliks to his lodging.
sentences.cn: 他们跟踪那个费利克斯到了他的住处.

sentences.en: We are lodging with Mr. Brown.
sentences.cn: 我们现在暂住在布朗先生的家.

sentences.en: Where can you find lodging for the night?
You get a big salary incentive and free board and lodging too.
sentences.cn: 你们能获得大笔激励性薪水，还可享受免费膳宿。

寄宿；寄宿处；出租的房间、住房

trans.tran_cn: 出租的房间，暂住，寄宿，借宿
